entry.title: TA training 2024 launched on manaba
entry.summary:
Dear graduate students,
The TA training seminar has now been launched on manaba. Those scheduled to engage in TA duties must complete the seminar before commencing their tasks.

entry.title: General use of the Central Gymnasium Training Room for University Members (Trial Operation)
entry.summary: General use of the training room will continue on a trial basis from April 1, 2024 (Monday) onward.Â Â For more details, please refer to the following URL.
